application.name: mroctx2isis
application.brief: Import an MRO CTX image as an Isis cube
application.description: This program takes an image from the Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter Context Imager and produces an Isis cube containing the image data.

history.change: Added NaifFrameCode keyword to the Kernels group
Modified to convert from 8 to 12 bit data and pulled prefix and suffix data out of cube
Put dark prefix data in a table blob
Modified keywords to handle keywords that were modified in new data files. Modified the PREFIX and SUFFIX parameters to automatically compute, and added documentation.
Checks if input file is rdr.
Fixed bug where dark current data could be corrupted if FILLGAP was true

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This is the resultant cube, containing the image and label data.

parameter.name: PREFIX
parameter.description: Prefix dark pixels to strip off and put in a BLOB table. The default value is computed. This will compute what is believed to be the number of suffix pixels based on data in the labels. If you find that suffix pixels are being left on the edge of the image, adjust this parameter accordingly.

parameter.name: SUFFIX
parameter.description: Suffix dark pixels to strip off and put in a BLOB table. The default value is computed. This will compute what is believed to be the number of suffix pixels based on data in the labels. If you find that suffix pixels are being left on the edge of the image, adjust this parameter accordingly.

parameter.name: FILLGAP
parameter.description: The CTX table for the SQROOT SAMPLE_BIT_MODE_ID correlates the DN value zero to one. Errorenous data is also set to a DN value of zero. When enabled, this option assumes the DN values of zero are errenous data and thus zeros are set to NULL. When disabled, this data is preserved.
